controllers

クラス AsyncController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.AsyncController
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class AsyncController
extends play.mvc.Controller
    This controller contains an action that demonstrates how to write simple asynchronous code in a controller. It uses a timer to asynchronously delay sending a response for 1 second.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • message

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> message()
        An action that returns a plain text message after a delay of 1 second. The configuration in the routes file means that this method will be called when the application receives a GET request with a path of /message.

      • getFutureMessage

        private java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.lang.String> getFutureMessage(long time,
                                                                                java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
